metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: •   1 pound potato gnocchi •   1/4 cup butter •   2 cloves garlic, minced •   8 fresh sage leaves •   1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese •   Salt and pepper to taste Instructions:

•   Ingredients : o   1 cup rice  o   1 cup coconut milk  o   1 cup water  o   1/2 cup kidney beans  o   1 small onion  o   2 cloves garlic  o   1 teaspoon thyme  o   1 teaspoon salt •   Instructions : o   Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened.  o   Add rice, coconut milk, water, kidney beans, thyme, and salt.  o   Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender.  o   Serve warm.

•   Ingredients : o   4 potatoes  o   1 cup heavy cream  o   1/2 cup milk  o   2 cloves garlic  o   1/2 cup grated Gruyère cheese  o   1 teaspoon salt  o   1/2 teaspoon pepper •   Instructions : o   Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).  o   Peel and thinly slice potatoes.  o   Rub a baking dish with a cut clove of garlic.

•   Ingredients : o   4 cups green beans  o   1 can cream of mushroom soup  o   1/2 cup milk  o   1 cup fried onions  o   1 teaspoon salt  o   1/2 teaspoon pepper •   Instructions : o   Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).  o   Cook green beans until tender.  o   Mix soup, milk, salt, and pepper in a baking dish.  o   Add green beans and half of the fried onions, stir to combine.  o   Bake for 25 minutes.  o   Top with remaining fried onions and bake for an additional 5 minutes.  o   Serve warm.
•   Ingredients : o   1 pound paneer  o   1/2 cup yogurt  o   1 tablespoon lemon juice  o   1 teaspoon cumin  o   1 teaspoon coriander  o   1 teaspoon garam masala  o   1 teaspoon turmeric
